Name: M 29 - The Operating Budget of the Council of the City of NY.
Title: RESOLUTION APPROVING THE FISCAL YEAR 2025 OPERATING BUDGET OF THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF NEW YORK.

History.Description: This Resolution was P-C Item Approved by Comm

Text: Resolved: By the Council of the City of New York, pursuant to the provisions of section 243 of the New York City Charter that the following amounts shall be submitted to the Mayor, for inclusion in the executive budget for the operating budget for the Council of the City of New York.
